title: Frontend Developer
description: Skilled React developer needed to build and optimize responsive web apps. Experience in Tailwind and REST APIs is preferred.

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop scalable REST APIs using Node.js and MongoDB. Knowledge of microservices and Docker is a plus.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Creative UI/UX designer to craft beautiful, intuitive user experiences. Must know Figma, Adobe XD, and responsive design.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze large datasets and build dashboards with Power BI/Tableau. Proficiency in SQL and Python required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps expert needed to manage CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS infrastructure. Automate and secure cloud deployments.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build and maintain Android/iOS apps using Flutter. Understanding of native modules is a bonus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build ML models for real-time predictions. Experience with scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and NLP projects is expected.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a full-stack developer proficient in React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Experience with Next.js is a plus.

title: QA Engineer
description: Manual and automated testing of web applications. Proficiency in Selenium and writing test cases is required.

title: Product Manager
description: Coordinate product vision, design sprints, and development timelines. Experience in Agile and stakeholder communication needed.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create engaging designs for social media, websites, and ads. Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva is preferred.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor systems, detect vulnerabilities, and implement security protocols. CEH or CISSP certification is a plus.

title: Content Writer
description: Write blog posts, product descriptions, and marketing content. Excellent grammar and SEO knowledge required.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop smart contracts and DApps using Solidity and Ethereum. Familiarity with DeFi protocols preferred.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Plan and execute campaigns across social media, email, and Google Ads. Knowledge of SEO/SEM is a must.

title: System Administrator
description: Install, configure, and maintain Linux/Windows servers. Good knowledge of networking and firewalls required.

title: Business Analyst
description: Gather requirements, analyze data, and support decision-making processes. Strong Excel and stakeholder management skills are needed.

title: Technical Support Engineer
description: Provide Level 1 and 2 support for software products. Must have good communication and troubleshooting skills.

title: HR Executive
description: Manage recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement activities. MBA in HR preferred.
